frontmatter.title: New Website!
frontmatter.author: Alibek Kaliyev
frontmatter.excerpt: Hello! Welcome to my new website!

markdownRemark.html:
Hello! Welcome to my new website!

I'm so sad to say goodbye to the old one, but I am happy to announce that the new website is faster and most importantly has the blog feature. I will try to post English translations of popular posts from my Telegram blog or/and post exclusive content here.

If you don't know who I am, check out the About page.

Enjoy and have a good time!

By the way, thanks to @panr for providing this awesome template!
